weaponTalents.name: Breadbasket
weaponTalents.description: Landing body shots adds a stack of bonus +35% headshot damage to the next headshot for 10s. Max stack is 3.

weaponTalents.name: Killer
weaponTalents.description: Killing an enemy with a critical hit grants 40% critical hit damage for 10s.

weaponTalents.name: Preservation
weaponTalents.description: Killing a Target repairs 10% armor over 5 seconds. Headshot kills improve the repair by an additional 10%.

weaponTalents.name: Optimist
weaponTalents.description: Weapon damage is increased by 3% for every 10% ammo missing from the magazine.

weaponTalents.name: Strained
weaponTalents.description: Gain 10% critical hit damage for every 0.5s you are firing. Stacks up to 5 times.

weaponTalents.name: Close & Personal
weaponTalents.description: Kills a target within 7m grants +30% weapon damage for 10s.

weaponTalents.name: Fast Hands
weaponTalents.description: Critical hits add a stack of 4% reload speed bonus. Max stack is 40%.

weaponTalents.name: Sadist
weaponTalents.description: Deal +20% weapon damage to bleeding enemies. After 4 kills, applies bleed to the next enemy you hit.

weaponTalents.name: Vindictive
weaponTalents.description: Killing an enemy with a status effect applied grants you and all allies in 15m 15% critical hit chance and 15% critical hit damage for 20s.

weaponTalents.name: Ranger
weaponTalents.description: Amplifies weapon damage by 2% for every 5m you are away from your target.

weaponTalents.name: Steady Handed
weaponTalents.description: Hits grant a stack of +1% Accuracy and Stability. At 100 stacks, consumes them to refill the magazine.

weaponTalents.name: Spike
weaponTalents.description: Headshots grant +20% skill damage for 8s.

weaponTalents.name: Eyeless
weaponTalents.description: Deal +20% weapon damage to blinded enemies. After 4 kills, applies blind to the next enemy you hit.

weaponTalents.name: Ignited
weaponTalents.description: Deal +20% weapon damage to burning enemies. After 4 kills, applies burning to the next enemy you hit.

weaponTalents.name: Perpetuation
weaponTalents.description: Headshots grant +50% status effect damage and duration to the next status effect you apply. Cooldown: 20s.

weaponTalents.name: Reformation
weaponTalents.description: Headshots grant +30 skill repair for 8s.

weaponTalents.name: Rifleman
weaponTalents.description: Landing headshots adds a stack of bonus +10 weapon damage for 5s. Max stack is 5. Additional headshots refresh the duration.

weaponTalents.name: Boomerang
weaponTalents.description: Critical hits have a 50% chance to return the bullet to the magazine. If a bullet is returned to the magazine the next shot has +40% increased damage.

weaponTalents.name: Lucky Shot
weaponTalents.description: Magazine capacity is increased by 20%. Missed shot from cover have a 100% chance to return to the magazine.

weaponTalents.name: Near sighted
weaponTalents.description: Receive +80% stability at the cost of -35% optimal range

weaponTalents.name: On Empty
weaponTalents.description: Reloading from empty grants +30 weapon handling for 10s.

weaponTalents.name: Measured
weaponTalents.description: The top half of the magazine grants 20% rate of fire and -30% weapon damage. The bottom half of the magazine has -20% rate of fire and 30% total Weapon Damage.

weaponTalents.name: Overflowing
weaponTalents.description: Every 3 reloads from empty increases your base magazine capacity by 100%.

weaponTalents.name: Naked
weaponTalents.description: Hitting an enemy with no armor grants +50% headshot damage for 5s.

weaponTalents.name: First Blood
weaponTalents.description: If scoped, your first shot fired from out of combat or after fully reloading from empty deals headshot damage to any part of the body hit. REQUIRES: Requires a Scope with 8x magnification or higher

weaponTalents.name: pummel
weaponTalents.description: 3 consecutive kills refills the magazine and grants +40% weapon damage for 10s.

weaponTalents.name: Pumped Up
weaponTalents.description: Reloading grants +1% weapon damage for 10s. Stacks up to 25 times.

weaponTalents.name: Outsider
weaponTalents.description: After killing an enemy, gain 100% optimal range and +100% accuracy for 10s.

weaponTalents.name: Unwavering
weaponTalents.description: Swapping to this weapon grants +300 weapon handling for 5s. Kills refresh the buff. Swapping away disables this from all weapons for 5s.

weaponTalents.name: Unhinged
weaponTalents.description: Grants +15% weapon damage at the cost of -25% Stability and -25% Accuracy.

weaponTalents.name: Frenzy
weaponTalents.description: For every 10 bullets in the magazine capacity, gain +3% rate of fire and +3% weapon damage for 5s when reloading from empty.

weaponTalents.name: Overwhelm
weaponTalents.description: Suppressing an enemy, that is not currently suppressed, grants +10% weapon damage for 12s. Max stack is 4.

weaponTalents.name: Salvage
weaponTalents.description: Killing a target has a +70% chance to refill the magazine.

weaponTalents.name: Finisher
weaponTalents.description: Swapping from this weapon within 10s of killing an enemy grants 30% critical hit chance and critical hit damge for 15s.
